text:
e="preserve">Reynaldo Villar Umali (February 26, 1957 – January 7, 2021) was a Filipino politician. He was a member of the House of Representatives of the Philippines from 2010 to 2019. He ran as governor of Oriental Mindoro in 2019 but lost to Humerlito Dolor.
Umali died on January 7, 2021 from COVID-19 while being treated with liver cancer, aged 67.

annotations.surface_form: House of Representatives of the Philippines
